response: We capture art both on location and in our SoHo studio. Our hours of operation are Monday through Friday, from 9am to 5pm.

ask_about: cost estimation for a photo session
response: You should provide the details about the artworks at the time of booking. This allows us to prepare adequately for the session. As for special requests or specific setups, the cost may vary. It would be best to discuss these details with us at the time of booking so we can provide an accurate quote.
